common.pleaseWait: Please wait while we process your request

auth.title: Sign in with your email
auth.subtitle: We'll send you a one-time magic link to access your account.
auth.linkRequestSuccess: Magic link sent. Check your inbox.
auth.externalFailure: External login failed. Please try again.
auth.googleTokenPrompt: Paste the Google ID token provided by Google Sign-In
auth.githubTokenPrompt: Paste the GitHub access token obtained via OAuth or create a fine-grained token
auth.magicLinkSent: We sent a sign-in link to {email}. It expires in a few minutes.
auth.magicProcessing: Hang tight while we verify your link...
auth.magicSuccess: Signed in successfully. Redirecting you now.
auth.magicInvalidLink: This magic link is invalid or has already been used. Request a new one to sign in.
auth.magicFailed: We couldn't verify your link. Please request a new one.

validation.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address

createView.selectLanguageHint: Choose a language to create a new version of your resume:
createView.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this language version?
createView.emptyContentError: Please add content to the current resume before creating another language.

articles.title: Resume Writing Insights & Tips
articles.subtitle: Expert guidance on creating standout resumes and leveraging ResumeSpyWeb

items.title: Mastering Resume Writing: Best Practices for 2025
items.excerpt: Learn the essential techniques for crafting a compelling resume that captures recruiters' attention. From formatting to content strategy, discover what makes a resume truly stand out.

items.title: Resume Optimization: SEO for Your Career
items.excerpt: Just like websites need SEO, your resume needs optimization for Applicant Tracking Systems (ATS). Learn how to structure your resume to pass automated screening while remaining human-readable.

items.title: Showcasing Language Skills on Your Resume
items.excerpt: In today's global market, multilingual abilities are invaluable. Discover how to effectively present your language proficiency and leverage ResumeSpyWeb's multi-language features.

items.title: Version Control for Your Resume: Why It Matters
items.excerpt: Managing multiple resume versions is crucial for targeting different roles. Learn how ResumeSpyWeb's version control helps you maintain tailored resumes for every opportunity.

items.title: Creating Job-Specific Resumes Efficiently
items.excerpt: Generic resumes rarely work. Discover strategies for quickly customizing your resume for specific job descriptions using ResumeSpyWeb's powerful editing tools.

items.title: GitHub Profile to Professional Resume
items.excerpt: Transform your GitHub profile into a professional resume automatically. Learn how ResumeSpyWeb analyzes your repositories and contributions to build a compelling narrative.
